comments:
I did the things described in tutorial "Top Down Web Service Supporting 
Flexible Projects". So I had a project named "AreaProject". I right-click on 
the WebContent - folder and make a new WSDL-File names AreaService. If I click 
on the created File, the editor says: 
Unable to create this part due to an internal error. Reason for the failure: 
null argument; see stacktrace below.
Note: this problem only occurs for the described combination of projectname and 
filename.
